definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: dub.;—Impf. 3 ms. [[וְיִחְפּׂר מֵהַר הַגִּלְעָד יָשׁׂב]] Ju Jdg 7:3 let him return and (Vrss) let him depart, AV depart early (as Ki, fr. Aram. [[חפרא]], s.afara morning, improb.), wholly uncertain; Gr [[וְיַעֲבִר]]; on difficulty of ´[[מֵהַר הַגּ]] v. [[גִּלְעָד]]
and GFM, who conj. [[וַיִחְרְפֵם גִּדְעׂן]] and so Gidesonput them to test (cf. v:Jdg 7:4), so Bu Now (cf. Dr:Hast. ii. 176 n).
